content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_fullwidth_header title=”GET INVOLVED” subhead=”We need you” text_orientation=”center” header_scroll_down=”on” scroll_down_icon=”%%2%%” scroll_down_icon_color=”#ffffff” _builder_version=”3.17.2″ title_font_size=”65px” subhead_font_size=”35px” background_image=”https://www.ffpf.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/11/Volunteer-Student-0101.jpg” custom_padding=”8%||8%|” title_text_shadow_style=”preset3″][/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”54px|0px|0|0px|false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_color=”#ed1c24″]

Give

You want to help but don’t know how. You would like to attend a foundation event, but you are unavailable. A simple donation can make all the difference. Every dollar received goes to purchase medication and medical supplies for operations
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_css_main_element=”||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.ffpf.org/donate/” button_text=”Donate now!” button_alignment=”center” _builder_version=”3.17.6″ background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”7%|||” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”10%|||” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_last_edited=”off|phone”] 
[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_2,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”2″ _builder_version=”3.17.2″] 
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Be A Volunteer” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_color=”#ed1c24″ text_orientation=”center”]

Be A Volunteer

We need you

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”2″ _builder_version=”3.17.2″] 
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_color=”#ed1c24″]It is thanks to our many volunteers that we are able to make a difference. Our team is made up of a wide range of humanitarian workers:

  • Nurses
  • Occupational therapists
  • Doctors
  • Accountants
  • Students and many others.

All have in common the determination to make a significant difference in the daily life of the less fortunate and to help them build a better future.

These people dedicate themselves with humanism, generosity and empathy so that the families of this region can aspire to a better life.

You want to join our team? Contact us now.

Email address: vdargan@videotron.ca
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ffpf.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Volunteers-02.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”3.23″] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ffpf.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Volunteer-Student-03.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” disabled_on=”on||” _builder_version=”3.23″] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″]

Who can apply?

Students as well as professionals are always welcome to work with us. Persons having experience in healthcare and humanitarian activities and other NGO related experience will be preferred.
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″]

What are the benefits?

Volunteers participating in our activities will be provided the relevant experience letters and recommendations and will be able to become a part of someone’s life changing treatments.
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_image src=”https://www.ffpf.org/wp-content/uploads/2018/10/Volunteer-Student-03.jpg” align_tablet=”center” align_phone=”” align_last_edited=”on|desktop” disabled_on=”|on|on” _builder_version=”3.23″] 
[/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_2,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”2″ _builder_version=”3.17.2″] 
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”How To Apply?” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_color=”#ed1c24″ text_orientation=”center”]

How To Apply?

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”2″ _builder_version=”3.17.2″] 
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_4,1_4,1_4″ make_equal=”on” _builder_version=”3.25″][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ed1c24″]

Step 1

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%22%%” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”45px” _builder_version=”3.17.2″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”||0px|”] 
[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_orientation=”center”]

Contact Us

Write to us if you would like to part of the great humanitarian work.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ed1c24″]

Step 2

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%22%%” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”45px” _builder_version=”3.17.2″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”||0px|”] 
[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_orientation=”center”]

Telephonic Discussion

To get to know you, we will have an initial discussion on telephone to understand your motivation and relevant experiences.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ed1c24″]

Step 3

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%22%%” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”45px” _builder_version=”3.17.2″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”||0px|”] 
[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_orientation=”center”]

Face to Face Discussion

After the telephonic discussion we would invite you for a coffee or tea to discuss about the opportunities that we currently have or might have in the future.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_align=”center” header_text_color=”#ed1c24″]

Step 4

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_blurb use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%22%%” use_icon_font_size=”on” icon_font_size=”45px” _builder_version=”3.17.2″ text_orientation=”center” custom_margin=”||0px|” custom_padding=”||0px|”] 
[/et_pb_blurb][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_orientation=”center”]

Start the Work

Welcome to our team! Help us to help others.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_4,1_2,1_4″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”2″ _builder_version=”3.17.2″] 
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”FUNDRAISING” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_color=”#ed1c24″ text_orientation=”center”]

FUNDRAISING

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_divider divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”2″ _builder_version=”3.17.2″] 
[/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.6″ text_orientation=”center” hover_enabled=”0″ sticky_enabled=”0″]

Fundraising Dinner – Freedom from Poverty Foundation

November 5 – 7985 Maurice-Duplessis Blvd., Montreal

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat”][et_pb_column type=”2_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.7.6″ header_text_color=”#ed1c24″ header_3_line_height=”1.1em”]

Details

Come to discover the dedicated, compassionate people who are working to forge a better future for the poor in the region of Jamkhed, India. Join us for this unforgettable evening steeped in Indian culture. You will enjoy regional cuisine with an open bar and dance to the soundtrack of our DJ. This is what we call combining business with pleasure!

The money raised will fund future surgical missions in Jamkhed. These profits will help families to obtain the tools necessary to break the cycle of poverty in which they have been too long confined.
[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ header_text_color=”#ed1c24″ header_3_line_height=”1.1em”]

To purchase tickets:

Vinod Dargan: vdargan@videotron.ca
Dominic Talarico: 514 794-7800

Cost:
$125 per person
$1250 for 10 people
[/et_pb_text][et_pb_button button_url=”https://www.ffpf.org/donate/” button_text=”Make a donation” button_alignment=”left” _builder_version=”3.17.6″ background_layout=”dark”] 
[/et_pb_button][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

Every dollar received goes to purchase medication and medical supplies for operations     Be A Volunteer We need you   It is thanks to our […]
